creator: elod@itfais.com
text:
There are many ways to set a property with in a build project, but there is 
no way to remove one.   There are times when it is desireable to actually 
remove an existing property (essentially, undefining it).  This may be 
useful in conjuction with the "if" attribute of a target.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: Could you give an example where unsetting a property would help?

I'm marking as WONTFIX as this goes against the current Ant property 
immutability rules.
creator: jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
